keyMoments.title: First Mention of the Blackbeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: Dalton reveals that five months ago, a crew of only five pirates led by a captain calling himself 'Blackbeard' attacked Drum Island. Despite their small numbers, they were so powerful that King Wapol fled in terror with his entire army and all the island's doctors.
keyMoments.significance: This is the first mention of the Blackbeard Pirates in the One Piece anime, introducing what will become one of the most important antagonist crews in the series. The mention establishes their fearsome reputation and foreshadows their significance to the story.

jollyRoger.description: Unknown at this point in the story

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Bighorn Village
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates gain the trust of Drum Island's inhabitants and are welcomed into Bighorn village.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's ability to win over initially hostile communities through their actions and character.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Decision to Save Nami
keyMoments.description: Luffy decides to climb the treacherous Drum Rockies while carrying Nami to save her life, with Sanji volunteering to accompany him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty and Luffy's dedication to his nakama, a core theme of the series.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
